channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Tomcat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Tomcat

item.title: CVE-2019-17569|2024-08-05T01:40:15.855Z -- apache -- apache%20tomcat
item.description: The refactoring present in Apache Tomcat 9.0.28 to 9.0.30, 8.5.48 to 8.5.50 and 7.0.98 to 7.0.99 introduced a regression. The result of the regression was that invalid Transfer-Encoding headers were incorrectly processed leading to a possibility of HTTP Request Smuggling if Tomcat was located behind a reverse proxy that incorrectly handled the invalid Transfer-Encoding header in a particular manner. Such a reverse proxy is considered unlikely.
